0/ #DeFi Spotlight #2  Today, I’ll explain the types of DEXs in the world of Ethereum. There are 5 types:  *Off-chain order book (0x Relayers)  *On-chain order book (EtherDelta)  *Peer-to-peer (Kyber, AirSwap)  *Automatic market making (Uniswap)  *Child-chain (Gluon Plasma)
